data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字

Additionally, they ____ then ____ the ____ and ____ to ____ the ____ online ____ the ____ of ____. This means that they can work online and don't need a physical shop, these are known as virtual companies.
data.partBlankContent: The internet is a great place for businesses to do marketing and advertisement. This all___ companies t_ reach a larger audi____ ( a global audi____ ) wh__ they d_ marketing. Additionally, they c__ then u__ the inte____ and webs____ to se__ the prod____ online wi__ the u__ of deli____. This means that they can work online and don't need a physical shop, these are known as virtual companies.
data.fullContent: The internet is a great place for businesses to do marketing and advertisement. This allows companies to reach a larger audience ( a global audience ) when they do marketing. Additionally, they can then use the internet and websites to sell the products online with the use of delivery. This means that they can work online and don't need a physical shop, these are known as virtual companies.
data.answer: 互联网是商家做市场营销和广告的好地方。这使得公司在进行营销时能够接触到更大的受众(全球受众)。此外，他们可以使用互联网和网站销售产品的使用配送在线。这意味着他们可以在网上工作，不需要实体店，这就是所谓的虚拟公司。
